summary: A Demi-God companion that fights alongside the Dovahkiin!...
descriptionHtml:
****Lothar The God Of War NOW COMES IN 5 (1 EDITION IN DRAGONPLATE ARMOR AND 1 EDITION IN COMPANIONS ARMOR) EDITIONS DEPENDING ON YOUR SKILL LEVEL AND/OR DIFFICULTY SETTING! =)****

Some 2000 Years ago the Demi-God Lothar came to Tamriel in secret...He has just revealed himself at Labyrinthian waiting for \"the one\", for the true and only Dovahkiin he will lend his aid, as a true friend he will stand by and fight alongside the Dovahkiin against the evil forces of darkness...

Lothar is my Personal bodyguard

Features: 

Lothar is fully \"interactive\" you can talk, exchange your Equipment with Lothar and he can wear any armor/clothes and weapons, you can also order him around and he will obey.

Lothar is a trusty companion and he will follow you where ever you go!, Lothar is a very powerful Demi-God (Level 70), and he has very high HP (Health)

Lothar has no armor Equipment  \"vanilla\", But you can Equip your favoruite Armor on him if you wish. Lothar is very big and strong and he fights with a Daedric Greatsword in melee combat, Lothar sometimes uses a bow in ranged fights.

You can find Lothar outdoors at Labyrinthian standing in the temple grounds waiting for you, just search the area and you will find him, just talk to him and he will follow you. 

**Please Note, this is my FIRST follower(NPC) MOD for skyrim so i have alot to learn =)**

Have fun!
author: DarkIncLegion and VelociraptorGTX
